nodes.name: claimTokensFromErc677
claimTokens
claimTokensFromErc677
claimTokens

claimTokens(address,address).details: Withdraws the erc20 tokens or native coins from this contract.

params._token: address of the claimed token or address(0) for native coins.

claimTokensFromErc677(address,address).details: Withdraws erc20 tokens or native coins from the token contract. It is required since the bridge contract is the owner of the token contract.

params._token: address of the claimed token or address(0) for native coins.

decimalShift().details: Returns the value of foreign-to-home decimal shift.

executeSignatures(bytes,bytes).details: Validates provided signatures and relays a given message

params.signatures: bytes blob with signatures to be validated

feeManagerContract().details: Retrieves the address of the fee manager contract used.
feeManagerContract().return: address of the fee manager contract.

getFeeManagerMode().details: Retrieves the mode of the used fee manager.
getFeeManagerMode().return: manager mode identifier, or zero bytes otherwise.

maxAvailablePerTx().details: Retrieves maximum available bridge amount per one transaction taking into account maxPerTx() and dailyLimit() parameters.
maxAvailablePerTx().return: minimum of maxPerTx parameter and remaining daily quota.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

setFeeManagerContract(address).details: Updates the address of the used fee manager contract. Only contract owner can call this method. If during this operation, home fee is changed, it is highly recommended to stop the bridge operations first. Otherwise, pending signature requests can become a reason for imbalance between two bridge sides.

params._feeManager: address of the new fee manager contract, or zero address to disable fee collection.

setGasPrice(uint256).details: Public setter for fallback gas price value. Only bridge owner can call this method.

params._gasPrice: new value for the gas price.

setHomeFee(uint256).details: Updates the fee percentage for home->foreign bridge operations. Only owner is allowed to call this method. If during this operation, home fee is changed, it is highly recommended to stop the bridge operations first. Otherwise, pending signature requests can become a reason for imbalance between two bridge sides.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.
